d:
莫宁教授的脚真是太诱人了，作为资深足控的作者，一开始就准备要做这期作品了。可惜前面搞烂活做系列花了太多时间，加上莫宁的脚部lora太难还原了，中途剧情推倒重来了好几次，终于在今晚完成了。
这几天工作太忙了，没时间打游戏，一看论坛怎么全都是再见了，莫小妹！我知道爱弥斯很迷人，但莫宁酱难道不可爱吗？而且还有全游顶尖的玉足。作为资深足控，作者一定要为莫宁正道，于是打算连干两期，这一期为上篇学生篇，下一期也在紧密制作中。答应我，一定要抽莫小妹好吗
玩笑归玩笑，这段时间作图，连着肝了十几天，作者也是燃尽了，准备先回去把之前打了一半的沉没意志打完。。。之后也会加快更新的
最后感谢您的观看与支持，祝您观看愉快~
All 632P 完整版在以下⬇️⬇️ | The full version is below⬇️⬇️ | 完全版は以下のとおりです⬇️⬇️：
Patreon:https://www.patreon.com/c/Ryx0
Unifans:https://app.unifans.io/c/ryx7
Fansky:https://www.fansky.net/Ryx

Professor Mornye's feet are truly irresistible! As a seasoned foot fetishist, I planned to create this piece from the very beginning. Unfortunately, I spent too much time on other projects and creating a LORA model for Mornye's feet proved incredibly difficult, leading to several restarts of the story. Finally, I finished it tonight.
I've been so busy with work these past few days that I haven't had time to play games. When I checked the forums, all I saw were "Goodbye, Mornye!" posts! I know Amis is charming, but isn't Morning-chan adorable too? And she has some of the best feet in the entire game! As a seasoned foot fetishist, I had to defend Morning's honor, so I decided to do two parts. This is the first part, the student version, and the next part is currently in production. Please promise me you'll pull for Mornye!
Jokes aside, I've been working on these illustrations for over ten days straight, and I'm completely burnt out. I'm going to go back and finish the game I was playing before... I'll also speed up the updates afterward.
Finally, thank you for watching and your support. I hope you enjoy it!
n: [Misc] [Ryx] 莫宁-师生关系（足控向）学生篇[AI Generated]
